#leftSideBar
IMPERIAL GOLF CLUB IS ANXIOUS TO HOST YOUR UPCOMING WEDDING RECEPTION OR PRIVATE SOCIAL EVENT.
Imperial Golf Club is the ideal location for any social occasion. With breathtaking views overlooking our lush golf course and beautiful lakes, Imperial’s stylish venues provide the perfect backdrop for your upcoming event. Your special memories will come to life with the assistance of Imperial’s professional catering staff who offer over 30 years of combined private banquet experience. Imperial is available to host corporate gatherings, charity events, weddings, or any other special occasion whether it be large or small.
For menus and additional event planning information, please contact:
Lynsey Addison
Director of Food and Beverage
239-260-8524
lynseya@imperialgolfclub.org
#main

Driving Directions
The club is located on 41 – just 1 mile North of Immokalee Rd.
Take exit 111 off 75. Head West on Immokalee Rd. Drive 3 miles and make a right on 41. Go 1 mile north on 41 and turn right on Imperial Golf Course Blvd. Drive 1 mile to the Clubhouse.
We are a gated community – please be prepared to show a driver’s license.
Surrounding Area Map:
Click Here for Printable Directions
#main
#content2
#contentContainer2

Discover a Unique Golf Experience ...
...that is truly Beyond Measure
Learn More
Our down-to-earth membership atmosphere is built on Midwestern values. We’re home
to wonderful people and an uncomplicated way of life that is shared and enjoyed by
bright minds and big thinkers from a variety of backgrounds.
Balanced Appeal...Something for Everyone
Imperial attracts a diverse and friendly group of male and female members, both
couples and singles.
From the very first day and the very first round, members are invited to enjoy a full slate
of equally strong groups, events, and activities. Unlike most golf clubs, we go out of our
way to embrace the needs and interests of all members, even if golf isn’t a priority.
Our renowned
“
Girlfriends
’
Group
”
perfectly illustrates how open and welcoming the
Imperial social environment is, with over 300 female members, golfers and non-golfers
alike, that regularly take part in organized events and activities at the club and around
the Naples community.
Smart Value
Membership at Imperial delivers more for less. We don’t burden our members with the
cost of duplicating their residential community amenities. Instead, we focus our
resources on providing an unrivaled golf membership experience – without adding
unnecessary amenities or uncertain capital risks associated with most country clubs.
Our clear strategic vision and our continued attention to responsible fiscal management
allow Imperial to maintain consistently attractive initiation fees and dues as compared to
other clubs, and claim the distinct reputation as “
The best overall golf membership value
in southwest Florida.
”
Residency Is Not A Requirement For Membership
The majority of our golf members live outside the Imperial community. In fact, many
reside in nearby golf communities, on the water, and in local condominium complexes.
We cordially invite resident and non-resident neighbors alike to discover what makes us
the friendliest and most enjoyable golf membership in southwest Florida.
The Joining Process
Imperial is an inclusive club with a friendly joining process. You do not have to know a
current member or be invited to join. Upon receiving your completed application, the
process is typically quick and straightforward. For the benefit and protection of all our
members, we do ask that candidates subject to a standard background check.
Learn More about Membership and Imperial Golf Club
Membership Options
Imperial Golf Club offers a variety of equity and non-equity membership categories
classified by age and club privileges. To preserve the golf experience,
our golfing
memberships are capped at 280 members per golf course.
Request  Membership Information
